alert.note: Alert for Burke Mountains; Caldwell Mountains; Eastern McDowell; Eastern Polk; Greater Burke; Greater Caldwell; Greater Rutherford; McDowell Mountains; Polk Mountains; Rutherford Mountains (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Greenville-Spartanburg (Western North Carolina and Northwest South Carolina)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 08 at 3:57AM EST until January 09 at 10:00PM EST by NWS Greenville-Spartanburg
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 10 AM TO 10 PM EST TUESDAY... * WHAT...South winds 15 to 25 mph with gusts up to 45 mph expected. * WHERE...Portions of northeast Georgia, the North Carolina foothills, and the northern Upstate of South Carolina. * WHEN...From 10 AM to 10 PM EST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Heavy rain on Tuesday will saturate the soil and allow strong wind gusts to blow down numerous trees. Some may fall on power lines and result in power outages.
info.instruction: Secure outdoor objects. Stay tuned to NOAA Weather Radio or your favorite source of weather information for the latest updates. Additional details can be found at www.weather.gov/gsp. A Wind Advisory means that winds of 35 mph or greater are expected. Winds this strong can make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Use extra caution.
